Achieving Sustainable growth & jobs is not just the Responsibility of one of us. It is the Responsibility of all of us.
Europe has Overcome the peak of the Crisis, but too many Europeans are unemployed (11.5%) and facing the social Consequences of the Crisis
We expect Economic growth to pick up in all the 28 EU Member States next year, accelerating in the 2016th
The risk of persistent low growth in today's environment of low inflation and high nt are our primary concern.
The EU Investment Plan for Europe must be accompanied by essential structural Reforms coupled with fiscal Responsibility.
A Lack of fiscal Responsibility and Reforms can put at risk our growth prospects. Member States Should follow-up on Their Commitments.
We count on @Europarl_EN for keeping up pressure in making sure That Commitments are delivered on both-EU and Member States level. #EP

Relations between Russia and Azerbaijan are developing very dynamically, covering all areas and contributing to the development of the relations between the United States and Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/51DH6aRes1
Traditions of multiculturalism existed centuries in Azerbaijan.
This is the basis of national solidarity in our country, the basis of modern dynamic development.
The society fully supports the state's tolerance policy. There is no disagreement here.
This year we expect 6-7% growth in non-oil sector of Azerbaijan's economy.
Next year, we expect the economy to grow from 6 to 10 percent in the non-oil sector.
We will try to make oil revenues ideally about a third of our gross domestic product.
We can already say that our diversification policy is taking place.
The reforms we carry out are also related to social factors. Therefore, despite fundamental reforms in Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/1pI3gP5csF
Both Armenia and Azerbaijan positively assessed the meeting of the prelists in Paris and noted in their open statement.
But just two weeks later, Armenia began to conduct so-called military exercises in the occupied part of our territory.
According to Armenia itself, 47 thousand military servicemen and thousands of types of equipment participated in military exercises.
The question is: What was it necessary to do provocations immediately after a positive meeting in Paris?
The OSCE Minsk Group should have a clearer attitude to this misinformation of the Armenians and should have been offensive to their actions.
Events in the world show that international institutions can not cope with their tasks, (cont) http://t.co/YyQayyicFU
Leading countries in the world should speak their own words here, not only by declarations, but also by respecting the decisions they make.
The emergence of the so-called "Islamic State of Iraq-Damascus", at least in the past 10 years, has come to a close (cont) http://t.co/Xg730mnQMH
This once again proves that it is necessary to be very careful and visionary in supporting radical, fanatic groups.
Azerbaijan has no internal sources of radicalism. Islam is a religion of peace.
Our national and religious values ​​require such a peaceful approach to the solution of all issues.
Azerbaijan is a secular state, a modern state with a high level of education. Education is fundamental to radicalism.
The European Games to be held in Baku in 2015 will be a sufficient scale.
We expect more than 6,000 athletes to compete in 20 kinds of sports.
European Games in Muslim Countries Multiculturalism, Civilizations and Cultures (cont) http://t.co/5CWp1ZN7fT

This satellite will help us to evaluate our capabilities in agriculture, emergency situations, and other areas of our lives.
Holding of BakuTel exhibition for 20 years shows that Azerbaijan is one of the centers of the region in terms of ICT development.
